title: Russia’s Central Bank: Tokenization Will Let Foreigners Buy Domestic Shares - Yahoo Finance
summary:
Central Bank wants to let overseas investors buy Russian shares, but says foreign companies must provide trading solutions Russia’s Central Bank wants to use tokenization solutions to grant foreign buyers access to shares in domestic companies.
When asked about the tokenization of Russian shares, the Central Bank executive responded with a positive response, calling it a “possible option.” Vladimir Chistyukhin, the First Deputy Chairman of Russia’s Central Bank.
